news.title: A chiral fermionic valve driven by quantum geometry
news.description: Nature, Published online: 31 December 2025; doi:10.1038/s41586-025-09864-5Fermionic currents of opposing chirality can be spatially filtered without the need for a magnetic field using the quantum geometry of topological bands in single-crystal PdGa.

news.title: South Korea's Lee abandons hardline course on Pyongyang
news.description: With ties between the two Koreas at rock bottom, South Korea's Lee Jae Myung is advancing several initiatives aimed to build bridges with the Kim Jong Un regime — including one focusing on the martial art of taekwondo.

news.title: Study sheds new light on the role of NSUN2 protein in cardiac hypertrophy and heart failure
news.description: A recent study published in Engineering has shed new light on the role of the protein NSUN2 in the development of cardiac hypertrophy and heart failure.

news.title: Emma Johnston, a marine ecologist with institutional reach, has died at 52
news.description: Universities like to present themselves as durable institutions. They outlast governments, ride out recessions, and take pride in the slow accumulation of knowledge. news.title: CBS’ ‘New Year’s Eve Live: Nashville’s Big Bash’ Special Faces Mid-Show Outage
news.description: CBS faced a technical snafu that knocked the live broadcast of “New Year’s Eve Live: Nashville’s Big Bash” off the air for about 12 minutes on Wednesday night. news.title: Johnson to hold talks with Palace boss Glasner
news.description: Brennan Johnson will meet Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner on Thursday before making a final decision on whether to complete a £35m move from Tottenham.
